definition: water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes
surname Yin/abbr. for 印度[Yin4 du4]
to print/to mark/to engrave/a seal/a print/a stamp/a mark/a trace/image

sentences.english: The experiments show that the watermarking is perceptually invisible and robustable.
sentences.chinese: 實驗結果表明，水印具有良好隱蔽性和魯棒性。

sentences.english: This paper presents a blind audio watermarking algorithm with self-synchronization based on Psychoacoustic Model.
sentences.chinese: 提出了一種基於心理聲學模型的自同步音頻水印算法。

sentences.english: Finally, we use error correcting coding to improve secure algorithm.
sentences.chinese: 最後，利用糾錯碼理論進一步改進水印算法。

sentences.english: An improved watermarking algorithm of odd-even quantification based on chaotic map is proposed.
sentences.chinese: 提出了一種基於混沌映射的改進奇偶量化水印算法。

sentences.english: We need a new technology to solve these problems, therefore presswork watermarking is proposed.
sentences.chinese: 因次，印刷數字水印技術應運而生。

sentences.english: Configure watermark images available to all users in site admin.
sentences.chinese: 在站點管理中對所有用戶可用的水印圖片進行配置。

sentences.english: Line shift text watermarking algorithm, strong robustness, use of boundary.
sentences.chinese: 行移文本水印算法，強魯棒性，邊界掃描採用投影法。

sentences.english: A subsample based watermarking scheme has been investigated for digital audio in this study.
sentences.chinese: 提出了一種基於分抽樣的音頻數字水印算法。

sentences.english: A blind image watermarking procedure based on the zerotree wavelet is presented.
sentences.chinese: 提出了一種基於零樹小波的盲圖像水印算法。

sentences.english: A dual watermarking algorithm that accepted JPEG compression was presented.
sentences.chinese: 提出了一類抗壓縮的魯棒加半脆弱雙水印算法。

sentences.english: In this paper, the wavelet decomposition and re-composition are applied to the watermark embedding and detection.
sentences.chinese: 數字水印的嵌入和檢測是通過小波分解和重構實現的。

sentences.english: CAJ-digital watermark in information security applications.
sentences.chinese: 數字水印在信息安全中的應用。

sentences.english: A new buyer-seller watermarking protocol without the third party was proposed, which used the idea of secret sharing and homomorphic public key cryptosystem.
sentences.chinese: 提出了一種新的無第三方參與的買方賣方水印協議。

sentences.english: The proposed algorithm solved the conflict of watermark robustness and perceptual invisibility.
sentences.chinese: 算法很好地解決了水印魯棒性和不可見性之間的矛盾。

sentences.english: In this paper, a digital text watermarking algorithm based on Chinese characters structure is proposed.
sentences.chinese: 提出一種基於漢字字型結構的文本數字水印算法。

sentences.english: The proposed algorithm can extract the watermark without the help from the original digital audio signal.
sentences.chinese: 該算法提取水印信息時不需要原始數字音頻信號。

definition: to use an image without permission
to pixelate an image/to key in captcha authentication codes
diagram/picture/drawing/chart/map/CL:張|张[zhang1]/to plan/to scheme/to attempt/to pursue/to seek
